name: Butter Chicken
description: Iconic Indian curry with tender chicken in a rich, creamy tomato sauce. A worldwide favorite.

instructions.instruction: Marinate chicken with yogurt, turmeric, 1 tsp garam masala and salt. Let sit 30 minutes.
Place marinated chicken on a baking sheet. Bake at 200°C for 20 minutes.
Melt butter in a large pan. Sauté onion for 5 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute.
Add tomato paste, remaining garam masala, cumin and chili. Cook 2 minutes.
Add 1 cup water, simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream, simmer for 5 more minutes.
Add cooked chicken to sauce, simmer 5 minutes.

tips: Chicken can be grilled or pan-fried instead of baked.
Add water if sauce is too thick.
Use coconut cream for dairy-free version.
storageInfo: Refrigerate for 3 days. Add water when reheating.
servingSuggestion: Serve with basmati rice and naan bread.
variations: Make it spicier with extra chili.
Add kasuri methi (dried fenugreek leaves) for authentic flavor.
